Articles.Content:
Is anyone else getting odd plumes with the RSS/RO version of the F1 engines, J2 engines, and sep/LES motors?  Like, for some reason, RealPlume would put a Hypergolic-Upper plume on the DECQ F1.

If so, I did write my own RealPlume patch for the F1, and it should work for the insulated F1.  I just don't know what config file is tagging the DECQ F1 as "hypergolic."

I'll correct the issues with the J2 engine and the sep motors/LES later.

Edited March 11, 2020 by Nittany Tiger

12 hours ago, MuriloMoreira said:

1.9.1 ?

Test it.
I am in process of adopting.
I'm having problems in version 1.4.4, I install everything as requested and in the end the only parts that appear are the launch tower and the rover, does anyone know how to solve it?

On 5/28/2020 at 12:17 PM, MuriloMoreira said:

I'm having problems in version 1.4.4, I install everything as requested and in the end the only parts that appear are the launch tower and the rover, does anyone know how to solve it?

patience will solve it.  the guy above you did state he was in the process of adopting the mod from Decq
Does this work in 1.10

15 minutes ago, slaapzz said:

Does this work in 1.10

Best thing you can do is install it and try.
Any news on the revival of this mod?

2 hours ago, Furiousgaming34 said:

Any news on the revival of this mod? 

Doubtful. If you're looking for a Saturn V mod, use BDB. Just had a huge update, and they're starting on revamping the Saturn V soonish after they finish up with bugs and parts that were meant for the update.
Ok thanks

Hi there,

I really love this mod and it's still my favourite Saturn V mod.
But would it be easy possible to making the reflection work for the whole CM (maybe even the SM)? Currenty I've only reflection on the forward heat shield respectively docking module:

That would make this great mod even better.,

Thank you and best regards


P.S.

I use KSP 1.8.1
Hey I was just asking how you got the mod working on 1.8. When I installed it only the rover and launch tower was available in game.  Thanks in advance.

13 hours ago, Furiousgaming34 said:

Hey I was just asking how you got the mod working on 1.8. When I installed it only the rover and launch tower was available in game.  Thanks in advance.
 

I didn't do anything special. I just copied the "ATS" and the "CommunityResourcePack" Folders into the Gamedata-Folder and it worked.

What happens when your try load the included Craft-File?  Any missing parts?

12 hours ago, Hinkypunk said:

I didn't do anything special. I just copied the "ATS" and the "CommunityResourcePack" Folders into the Gamedata-Folder and it worked.

What happens when your try load the included Craft-File?  Any missing parts?

Hi, I just had time to get on my PC. I installed the mod again and it worked! I’m pretty sure I installed it wrong because I went inside the ATS folder and copied the SATURN_V folder into  my game data instead. The included craft files loaded perfectly fine. I loaded the craft file with no issue and tried to fly it to the moon. I have only tried it once but currently I think it is working fine. 

Thanks for helping me get this mod working!

On 11/4/2020 at 11:02 PM, Hinkypunk said:

Hi there,

I really love this mod and it's still my favourite Saturn V mod.
But would it be easy possible to making the reflection work for the whole CM (maybe even the SM)? Currenty I've only reflection on the forward heat shield respectively docking module:

That would make this great mod even better.,

Thank you and best regards


P.S.

I use KSP 1.8.1

 

Use ROCapsules, it has this DECQ's CSM with Textures Unlimited support.

On 11/7/2020 at 2:11 PM, Pioneer_Steve said:

Use ROCapsules, it has this DECQ's CSM with Textures Unlimited support.

I usually don't use RSS and RO, because my computer is quite slow and I don't reach anys good fps.
But I have tried it now with ROCapsules. I got Reflections in the VAB, but as soon it's on the launch ramp or in the orbit the reflections are gone.

But still thank you for your tipp.
Anyone else have the problem where the LM RCS doesn’t work.

if i use this on 1.8.1, the S-II, S-IVB, LEM and CSM only have oxidizer and the rover will not fold up. if i use on 1.10.1, if freezes on the subsat, so i delete that, load the game and then the CM's main and drogue chutes are gone and the rover wont fold up. please do something about this

Hello, when i start the game the loading stops. In the loading bar is: ATS/SATURN_V/DECQ_PROJECT_APOLLO/SUBSAT/APOLLO_SubSat

I was waiting for 30 minuts, but nothing happened.

Please, if someone knows what is the problem, please help. Thank you.

https://www.deviantart.com/fuzzercz/art/Ksp-loading-bug-865859770
Wonderful rocket, but can you please update this, this isn't working on 1.11.

I have a problem with the subat in the ATS. Its stuck in the loading and saying this. ATS/SATURN_V/DECQ_PROJECT_APOLLO/SUBSAT/APOLLO_SubSat

Can someone help me with that?

my version is 1.11.1

Edited May 15, 2021 by 88albert6

For some reason it doesn't work, when i load it said it loaded the parts, but they weren't there.

i think it was my fault for not installing a compatible version of Kerbal Joint Reinforcement
This mod still being updated? Its one of my favorites but its sad to see it still in 1.4, last I tried it didn't work well in the latest versions.
